Sql.query: insert into prn_medicioneq( equicodi, prnmeqtipo, medifecha, areacodi, prnmeqdepurar, prnmeqdejevsrpf, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, H9, H10, H11, H12, H13, H14, H15, H16, H17, H18, H19, H20, H21, H22, H23, H24, H25, H26, H27, H28, H29, H30, H31, H32, H33, H34, H35, H36, H37, H38, H39, H40, H41, H42, H43, H44, H45, H46, H47, H48, prnmequsucreacion, prnmeqfeccreacion, prnmequsumodificacion, prnmeqfecmodificacion ) values ( :equicodi, :prnmeqtipo, :medifecha, :areacodi, :prnmeqdepurar, :prnmeqdejevsrpf, :H1, :H2, :H3, :H4, :H5, :H6, :H7, :H8, :H9, :H10, :H11, :H12, :H13, :H14, :H15, :H16, :H17, :H18, :H19, :H20, :H21, :H22, :H23, :H24, :H25, :H26, :H27, :H28, :H29, :H30, :H31, :H32, :H33, :H34, :H35, :H36, :H37, :H38, :H39, :H40, :H41, :H42, :H43, :H44, :H45, :H46, :H47, :H48, :prnmequsucreacion, :prnmeqfeccreacion, :prnmequsumodificacion, :prnmeqfecmodificacion )

update prn_medicioneq set areacodi = :areacodi, prnmeqdepurar = :prnmeqdepurar, prnmeqdejevsrpf = :prnmeqdejevsrpf, H1 = :H1, H2 = :H2, H3 = :H3, H4 = :H4, H5 = :H5, H6 = :H6, H7 = :H7, H8 = :H8, H9 = :H9, H10 = :H10, H11 = :H11, H12 = :H12, H13 = :H13, H14 = :H14, H15 = :H15, H16 = :H16, H17 = :H17, H18 = :H18, H19 = :H19, H20 = :H20, H21 = :H21, H22 = :H22, H23 = :H23, H24 = :H24, H25 = :H25, H26 = :H26, H27 = :H27, H28 = :H28, H29 = :H29, H30 = :H30, H31 = :H31, H32 = :H32, H33 = :H33, H34 = :H34, H35 = :H35, H36 = :H36, H37 = :H37, H38 = :H38, H39 = :H39, H40 = :H40, H41 = :H41, H42 = :H42, H43 = :H43, H44 = :H44, H45 = :H45, H46 = :H46, H47 = :H47, H48 = :H48, prnmequsumodificacion = :prnmequsumodificacion, prnmeqfecmodificacion = :prnmeqfecmodificacion where equicodi = :equicodi and prnmeqtipo = :prnmeqtipo and medifecha = :medifecha
delete from prn_medicioneq where prnmeqtipo = :prnmeqtipo and medifecha = :medifecha

select m.*, e.equinomb, (select areanomb from eq_area a where m.areacodi = a.areacodi) as areanomb from prn_medicioneq m, eq_equipo e where m.equicodi = e.equicodi and m.equicodi = :equicodi and m.prnmeqtipo = :prnmeqtipo and m.medifecha = :medifecha

select m.*, e.equinomb, (select areanomb from eq_area a where m.areacodi = a.areacodi) as areanomb from prn_medicioneq m, eq_equipo e where m.equicodi = e.equicodi and (m.areacodi = :areacodi or 0 = :areacodi) and medifecha = :medifecha order by m.prnmeqdepurar desc, e.equinomb

select pto.ptomedicodi from me_ptomedicion pto join eq_equipo eq on pto.equicodi = eq.equicodi and(pto.origlectcodi in (1,2)) and(pto.ptomediestado = 'A') and(eq.famcodi in (4,5,37,39)) where eq.equicodi = :equicodi and pto.emprcodi = :emprcodi or eq.equicodi = :equicodi and -1 = :emprcodi
